data.eml:eml: Shallow water marine gammaridean amphipods of Pulau Tioman, Malaysia, with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azman, B. A. R., Othman, B. H. R. (2013): Shallow water marine gammaridean amphipods of Pulau Tioman, Malaysia, with the description of a new species. ZooKeys 335: 1-31, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.335.5567, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.335.5567
